word_mean: ［希］distolē dilatation心舒张〔期〕：心脏舒张或舒张期，尤指心室舒张期，相当于第二和第一心音之间的时期

sentence.Network_en: Each heartbeat has two basic parts: diastole and atrial and ventricular systole.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一次心脏跳动都包含两个基本部分: 舒张期以及方式收缩期.

sentence.Network_en: The length in the diastole was bigger than that in the systole.
sentence.Network_cn: 在舒张期其可视长度比收缩期长.

sentence.Network_en: Intensity of radio signal also had this variation between in diastole and in systole.
sentence.Network_cn: 离体心脏的心肌射频信号强度收缩期和舒张期之间也存在这种差异.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... diarrhoea 腹泻 diastole （心）舒张 diastolic pressure 舒张（血）压.
简介:心脏一次收缩和舒张构成的一个机械活动周期,称为心动周期(cardiac cycle)。在一个心动周期中,心房和心室各自具有收缩期(systole)和舒张期(diastole)。 心房和.
第239组diastole心脏舒张,心脏舒张期systole

diastole 心舒期；舒缓diastolic pressure 心舒压；低血压diastral type 双星型
¨ 舒张期杂音(Diastolic murmur): 位于S2与下个S1之间。如二尖瓣狭窄,主动脉瓣关闭不全等,多为病理性。 ¨ 连续性杂音(continuous murmur): 从收缩期一直持续.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek, separation, expansion', from diastellein, from dia 'apart' + stellein 'to place'

means.word_mean: 1. the widening of the chambers of the heart between two contractions when the chambers fill with blood

auth_sentence.content: There must be a systole and diastole in all inquiry.
